tool_description: Rules and details of 22 sports and games
name: Sports Rules
title: Sports Rules

api_list.name: Get the list of Sports
api_list.description: get the list of all sports,sports-name including images.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-rules.p.rapidapi.com/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-rules.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-rules.p.rapidapi.com/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-rules.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get rules for each sports
api_list.description: You can get the rules for each sport ,by passing the corresponding sportData id as param.
